class.name: StraightLineProblem

javadoc.text:
Class that models a straight line defined as {@code y = a x + b}. * The parameters of problem are: *
    *
  • {@code a}
    • *
  • {@code b}
    • *
* The model functions are: *
    *
  • for each pair (a, b), the y-coordinate of the line.
    • *
Cloud of points assumed to be fitted by a straight line.
Error (on the y-coordinate of the points).

javadoc.param: error Assumed error for the y-coordinate.

javadoc.text: Directly solve the linear problem, using the {@link SimpleRegression}class.
